page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: As normally I woke up and dressed went down stairs to the kitchen for my breakfast mum said,"Pack your cases." We were going to Birmingham to a christening of my Aunty Samantha's daughter.It was very warm when we left.It was a long journey to where we were going.The place we were going to was Atherstone.We got there after a long journey 2hrs 30 mins it took us. When we got there,there was a mess the house was a mess.Then we saw nan and grandad cooking."Oh" yes my nan doesn't do the cooking my grandad does.The doorbell went and there was Aunty Samantha and my Uncle Keith,with there daughter Alison Jane.The Saturday arrived and I was looking forward to Sunday . Well I went swimming with my friend Paula it was great fun.We then went home to Nan's.
